name: Amish Friendship Banana Nut Bread
author: LadybirdDee
summary: A banana-nut bread that requires a batch of Amish Friendship Bread Starter. Do not use any type of metal spoon or bowl for mixing.
ingredients: 2 cups Amish Friendship Bread Starter (see footnote for recipe link)
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
In a large bowl, mash together the shortening and bananas, then stir in the starter, eggs, milk, sugar, and walnuts
Sift together the baking powder, baking soda, salt, and flour
Divide batter evenly into the prepared pans
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean
Cool loaf until it loosens evenly from the pan, about 10 minutes, before removing to a wire rack to cool completely
